new-zealand.name: New Zealand
new-zealand.description: Vibrant pelagic diving, kelp forests, and unique marine life at the edge of the Pacific.

poor-knights-islands.name: Poor Knights Islands
poor-knights-islands.description: World-class marine reserve with arches, caves, and subtropical fish.

bay-of-islands.name: Bay of Islands
bay-of-islands.description: Wreck diving (Rainbow Warrior), clear waters, and abundant marine life.

fiordland.name: Fiordland
fiordland.description: Dramatic fjords, black coral, and rare marine species in cold, deep waters.

white-island.name: White Island (Whakaari)
white-island.description: Active volcano diving with geothermal vents and unique underwater landscapes.

stewart-island.name: Stewart Island
stewart-island.description: Remote southern diving, kelp forests, and rare species.

goat-island.name: Goat Island
goat-island.description: New Zealand's first marine reserve, easy shore diving and abundant fish.

wellington.name: Wellington
wellington.description: Kelp forests, wrecks, and diverse marine life at the bottom of the North Island.
